name: Obfuscated Command Line Using Special Unicode Characters
description: Adversaries may attempt to make an executable or file difficult to discover or analyze by encrypting, encoding, or otherwise obfuscating its contents on the system or in transit.
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`process.command_line:(*â* OR *€* OR *£* OR *¯* OR *®* OR *µ* OR *¶*)`
